text: Khirki Urqu (Quechua khirki armadillo, urqu mountain, "armadillo mountain", Hispanicized spelling Querque Orjo) is a mountain in the Wansu mountain range in the Andes of Peru, about high. It is located in the Arequipa Region, La Unión Province, Huaynacotas District. Khirki Urqu lies southwest of Q'illu Urqu. == References == Category:Mountains of Peru Category:Mountains of Arequipa Region
title: Khirki Urqu
